summary: Sustainability focuses on creating a future where innovation and design principles work harmoniously with nature and society. It emphasizes the shift from harmful practices to regenerative, decentralized systems that enhance our planet and communities. This approach aims to address global challenges by fostering resilient, interconnected ecosystems. The concept goes beyond mere conservation, advocating for continuous collaborative efforts to rejuvenate and renew our world, ensuring a balanced and thriving future for all.
excerpt: Innovation should enhance the planet and society. Decentralized, regenerative design can solve global challenges, shifting from harmful practices to resilient, interconnected ecosystems.
